title: How to Make Chicken Chili Pasta

steps.headline: Put any kind of pasta in a pot of water to boil.
steps.description: Penne pasta is good, but the kind doesn't matter. If you want to make it more healthy, you can get wheat pasta. Stir the pasta every couple of minutes.

steps.headline: Put two or three chicken breasts in a pot of water to boil also.
steps.description: Turn them over every few minutes to cook both sides well.

steps.headline: Warm up frozen mixed veggies in the microwave for about 5 minutes.
steps.description: Or if you only like corn or carrots, pick the vegetable you like.

steps.headline: Cook the pasta only until it is tender, and immediately pour it into a strainer to drain the water.
steps.description: Then transfer the pasta into a giant bowl. You might dribble it with olive oil and stir it to keep pasta from sticking together (over cooked, it would clump together and be mushy).

steps.headline: Add a can of chili to the pasta, and mix together.
steps.description: Also add a can of either Alfredo sauce or Marinara sauce, whichever you like best. Or you can add both. Also add about half a bottle of BBQ sauce, if you like BBQ sauce.

steps.headline: Pour the water out of the pot with the chicken.
steps.description: Cut up the chicken breasts into little pieces. Make sure no parts of the chicken is still pink. This can be harmful to your health. If any part is, cook the chicken longer.

steps.headline: Season the chicken with spices, to taste.
steps.description: Nutmeg, Oregano and Rosemary all have great health benefits. Also you can add BBQ sauce to the chicken. It makes it taste delicious!

steps.headline: Stir the chicken into the pasta mix.
steps.description: Eat it while hot or refrigerate to save it for later.

text: Put any kind of pasta in a pot of water to boil. Penne pasta is good, but the kind doesn't matter. If you want to make it more healthy, you can get wheat pasta. Stir the pasta every couple of minutes. Put two or three chicken breasts in a pot of water to boil also. Turn them over every few minutes to cook both sides well. Warm up frozen mixed veggies in the microwave for about 5 minutes. Or if you only like corn or carrots, pick the vegetable you like. Cook the pasta only until it is tender, and immediately pour it into a strainer to drain the water. Then transfer the pasta into a giant bowl. You might dribble it with olive oil and stir it to keep pasta from sticking together (over cooked, it would clump together and be mushy). Add a can of chili to the pasta, and mix together. Also add a can of either Alfredo sauce or Marinara sauce, whichever you like best. Or you can add both. Also add about half a bottle of BBQ sauce, if you like BBQ sauce. Pour the water out of the pot with the chicken. Cut up the chicken breasts into little pieces. Make sure no parts of the chicken is still pink. This can be harmful to your health. If any part is, cook the chicken longer. Season the chicken with spices, to taste. Nutmeg, Oregano and Rosemary all have great health benefits. Also you can add BBQ sauce to the chicken. It makes it taste delicious! Stir the chicken into the pasta mix. Eat it while hot or refrigerate to save it for later. Finished.
